title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 113.1 - Notice to the Chief Administrator
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 113.1 - Notice to the Chief Administrator

State Regulations

Whenever a judge or justice of the trial
courts of the Unified Court System has been unable to fully perform his or her
duties for a period of greater than 60 days because of accident or illness, the
administrative judge having jurisdiction over the court in which the judge or
justice is assigned to sit shall promptly give notice of such inability to
perform to the Chief Administrator of the Courts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
113.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
